title: In the Shadow of Death: Reflections on a Chronic Illness
description: In January 2003 I spent two weeks in a German hospital before I was diagnosed with Wegener's Granulomatosis. This collection contains my journey through a chronic illness. This ebook was written as remembrance for Vasculitis month (May) and to all of those people who have lived with and died from a chronic illness.
author: Cyn Bagley
